transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir good afternoon. Hardik Jain ki baat kar rahe?
Customer: Kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Vinod baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se Avnish ka senior.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uh Jain ji aapki services running hai hamare sath IndiaMART se Pooja Steel Enterprises ke naam se and aap ek feedback aaya tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usi ke regarding call kiya tha sir aapko kuch issue aa raha hai sir IndiaMART se matlab whatsapp vagaira pe kuch problem face ho rahi thi?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: To abhi wo hamare end se issue resolve humne concern team ko beat kiya tha jo hamare paas update hai to abhi aapne kya bola abhi is case mein aapko ab aap bol rahe ho aapke end se resolve hai to wo theek hai fir.

Executive: Sir humne aapki baat na pura check karaya apne backend se to unka ye kehna hai ki koi baat nahi sir ab main is cheez ke upar behas karne ka koi matlab to nahi hai na abhi bataiye. 
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Nahi behas wali baat hi nahi hai sir wo aapka concern hai to usme behas jaisi koi baat hi nahi hai na sir usko resolution karane ke liye hi to sir hum baithe hai agar hamare end se kuch hoga to hum bilkul usme help karenge sir.
Customer: Koi baat nahi main kya bolu usme chalo theek hai it's okay.
Executive: Sir is kuch points unhone jo hume likh ke diye hai na jiski vajah se wo block ho sakta hai jaise pending bulk aur unsolicited promotional message being reported or blocked by multiple users aur using automation tools that are not approved by Meta high frequency of messages new numbers not following whatsapp business community policy. Iski vajah se wo restriction ya blocking hoti hai sir.
Customer: Are sir ye sab whatsapp ke mere ko kyun feature bata rahe ho. Theek hai sir mujhe nahi is topic pe jyada behas karni hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi whatsapp ke feature nahi sir jo meri team ne batayi thi main aapko wo bas update de raha tha. Aapko already Avnish sir ne bhi bataya hoga.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai. Nahi nahi thank you sir thank you koi baat nahi sir.
Executive: To ye block mein hi dikkat aati hai sir matlab ye sorry main keh raha hu bulk mein hi problem aa rahi hogi na aapko.
Customer: Sir main kya bol raha hu ab aapki taraf se aap 100% right ho to is topic ko abhi khatam kar sakte hai?
Executive: Sir bilkul kar sakte hai agar aapko aise matlab main to ye chah raha tha ki agar kuch aur resolution ho paaye to main usko bhi dekhu sir isliye main aapko confirm kar raha tha. 
Customer: Sir main keh raha hu ki main pura maine pura clarification de diya Avnish ji ko ki hum jaise hi IndiaMART ke uh us pe gaye aur whatsapp ke button par humne click kara share and whatsapp wala. 
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai wo ask for review share catalog aata hai na.
Executive: Exactly bilkul sahi hai.
Customer: Haan wo to uske whatsapp par wo cheez land hoti hai. To jaise hi humne uske upar click kara within second within some second to hamara account block ho gaya to saaf saaf sir hai ki IndiaMART ke button ke through hum agar whatsapp par aa rahe hai to problem create ho raha hai wo ab isme main aur kitna aapko clarify karu isse jyada to clarification ho hi nahi sakta hai isme bhi aap kuch bhi bol doge to theek hai sir aapki sun lenge.

Executive: Aapka concern hai main mere end se dekh lunga mere end se aap mat kariye koi bhi aise koi dikkat nahi hai main mere end se kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer faced issues with WhatsApp blocking.



Resolution:

- Executive checked with backend team about issue.
- Executive explained possible reasons for WhatsApp blocking.
- Executive assured to resolve the issue from their end.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, blocking, resolution, indiamart
